metadata.note: Stacks are exclusive to troponin-supplements platform

products.name: Optimal Organ Protection Supplement Stack
products.description: Safeguard your wellness and performance with our comprehensive organ health stack, supporting both liver and kidney function as well as optimal carb utilization. The stack features targeted formulas for athletes seeking longevity, recovery, and enhanced nutrient partitioning.
products.subtitle: Liver, Kidney, and Glucose Support

availability.message: Available for purchase while supplies last

stackBenefits: Improves and maintains optimal liver function
Supports kidney health and blood pressure regulation
Enhances blood sugar control and nutrient partitioning
Ideal for high-performing athletes and proactive health seekers

usage.instructions: Take each product as labeled for comprehensive liver, kidney, and glucose support.
usage.timing: QRF Liver: Daily with water | Renal Reset: Daily or split AM/PM | Suppressor Max: With high-carb meals or as needed

products.name: Muscle Repair & Recovery Stack
products.description: Elevate your workout gains with our revolutionary intra-workout drink mix designed to enhance muscle recovery and boost your pumps in the gym. Promote a rejuvenating night's rest and optimize your training outcomes with our nighttime recovery formula, ensuring you wake up refreshed and ready for the next challenge.
products.subtitle: Faster Muscle Recovery
stackBenefits: Synergistic effects of intra-workout and nighttime nutrition

usage.instructions: Use Field Rations during workouts and Hit The Rack before bedtime for complete recovery support
usage.timing: Field Rations: During exercise | Hit The Rack: Before bed

products.name: Training Stack
products.description: Power your workout from the first rep to the last with the essential pre- and intra-workout stack by Troponin. The Training Stack combines energy, focus, pump, and muscle-protective intra-workout nutrition for complete workout optimization.
products.subtitle: Ultimate Pre & Intra-Workout Combo

availability.message: Available at a discounted bundle rate

stackBenefits: Boosts energy, focus, and muscle pumps
Supports muscle protein synthesis and hydration
Ideal for maximizing each workout session

usage.instructions: Take WTF Pre-Workout before training and Field Rations during exercise for optimal results.
usage.timing: WTF: Before training | Field Rations: During training
